description: Returns the content association. For more information about content associations---what they are and when they are used---see Integrate Amazon Q in Connect with step-by-step guides in the Amazon Connect Administrator Guide.

parameters.name: knowledgeBaseId
parameters.description: The identifier of the knowledge base.

parameters.name: contentAssociationId
parameters.description: The identifier of the content association. Can be either the ID or the ARN. URLs cannot contain the ARN.

nested_items.name: contentAssociation
nested_items.description: The association between Amazon Q in Connect content and another resource.

nested_items.name: knowledgeBaseId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the knowledge base.

nested_items.name: knowledgeBaseArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the knowledge base.

nested_items.name: contentArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the content.

nested_items.name: contentAssociationId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the content association. Can be either the ID or the ARN. URLs cannot contain the ARN.

nested_items.name: contentAssociationArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the content association.

nested_items.name: amazonConnectGuideAssociation
nested_items.description: The data of the step-by-step guide association.

nested_items.name: flowId
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of an Amazon Connect flow. Step-by-step guides are a type of flow.
